website_summaries.verdict: Whether at home or on the go, this lightweight, BPA-free coffee maker will create the perfect cup, time after time.
pros: Won't shatter like glass or ceramic drippers
Can use any ground coffee (although results will be better with freshly-ground beans)
Simpler to use than a French press with similar results
cons: Needs disposable paper filters, as permanent filters may not fit
Should be hand-washed vs. in the dishwasher

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to make coffee. I use an electric kettle to heat water, while that heats I grind coffee beans, rinse the inside of the Clever Coffee Dripper under water, add a paper filter and the freshly ground coffee. After the kettle finishes which is very quick, I let the water sit and come off the boil for a minute or so and add to the Clever Coffee Dripper. Let that steep for 3-4 minutes, place on coffee cup or travel mug and done. Clean up is easy too, rinse out and leave upside down in the sink strainer until the next morning. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: butch44

customer_reviews.title: French press/ pour over -combo
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and easy to make a nice cup of coffee- almost a combination of French Press and Pour Over- I let coffee brew/ sit for 3-4 mins and then just put over my mug- then dump paper filter out- rinse and done! Comes with a clear plastic top/ cover and a clear plastic coaster. I use the cover but not the coaster as much. Plenty of room for coffee/ water.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ketchens

customer_reviews.title: Variation of a French Press
customer_reviews.text: What this does is identical to a French Press, except it's using a filter with finer grounds, so it's not a new concept. The product costs 44.00 +/- but it's made of plastic--the markup has to be significantly high. Keep this in mind when buying one, as it's not made of a hardened material. The packaging doesn't provide any suggestions about serving size, etc., which is usually a personal choice, but it would be helpful. Overall, it's a nifty gadget, but very overpriced for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pour-Over
customer_reviews.text: We live overseas and move internationally every two or three years. We are very careful and experienced, but still, fragile things sometimes break when we move. Our Chemex glass coffee maker was one such casualty. So we bought the cup-top Clever maker and used it with our supply of thick Chemex paper filters. The result: Chemex-style coffee at a fraction of the cost but without the constant risk of breakage. Forget making a pot of so-so drip coffee with an electric maker and have a perfect cup instead. Good grounds, good filters, and good technique (see YouTube instructions) comprise the secret--along with this simple pour-over maker--to a great cup of joe.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Tango

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than I imagined it would
customer_reviews.text: I mostly just wanted a coffee cone with an auto shutoff so it wouldn't drip when I took it off the pot. Then I read the directions and discovered that the real purpose was to let the grounds soak for 3 to 4 minutes, to provide a richer taste. Wow, it really worked -- the coffee flavors are deeper and more intense. (And also, it doesn't drip when you pick it up, either!)
customer_reviews.author: Jack Mingo

customer_reviews.title: coffee steeper
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this coffee thang for about 10 weeks now and I think I like it. I am able to let the coffee steep for a while and squeeze more flavor out of it .I give it about two minutes then place it on top of my thermal carafe and add a little more hot water. Works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kito

customer_reviews.title: The very best coffee I have ever brewed has been with this ...
customer_reviews.text: The very best coffee I have ever brewed has been with this device. Use fresh beans, grind to a nice medium grind, pour water at 205 degrees Fahrenheit over the grounds contained in a bamboo filter:  Let steep for 3-5 minutes (or longer, if a stronger brew is desired.) Tip: a slight shake to make the grounds "flower" may also be desired. Empty into a LARGE mug. Warning, ! 12 oz. Mugs will not contain a full Dripper !!
customer_reviews.author: Canary Point Consulting LLC

customer_reviews.title: Best cup of coffee ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best cup of coffee ever! I own every coffee brewing device known to man, lol! I read about the Clever Coffee Dripper on a Barista's blog and frankly was skeptical but for the price I decided to give it a try. The Clever Coffee Dripper brews a cup of coffee better than my expensive French Press without the sediment. Absolutely great cup of coffee! Highly recommended this! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easier to clean than a French press, less labor intensive than pour over, and the flavor is amazing. Minus one star because after a month or so of daily use it started dripping while brewing. Now I just press on the valve to make sure it’s seated before putting the filter in. Still more convenient than cleaning out a French press every day.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly F.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Clever
customer_reviews.text: This really is a clever design. Coffee is allowed to steep in the dripper, just like a French Press. When the dripper is then placed on a coffee cup, the bottom drip area is opened to allow the coffee to flow, just like a Pour Over. Once set on the cup, the coffee does filter through quite quickly, unlike other pour over products. It is a bit larger than other pour over devices, so having a 16oz size coffee is no problem. This is actually my second purchase of the Dripper. This generation seems to be made of a better plastic than the previous generation.
customer_reviews.author: G. Blanco

customer_reviews.title: A good product I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stars because anything less seems to detract from a products reputation. Let's face it it's not a life changing product, but it does work really well and has made my pour thru coffee making easier. It allows you to put in exactly as much water as you want and steep it for exactly how long you want. Instead of with a regular cone where the coffee starts coming out as soon as you start pouring water in the top. A good product I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Dale L Dellarosa

customer_reviews.title: Clever indeed!!
customer_reviews.text: Very ingenious and just the update the pour over method has been in need of. I like the strength of French-pressed coffee because I can let it steep for as long as I like, but have to say that I'm not a big fan of the sediment the method produces in your cup. Enter, this product... It's absolutely the best of both worlds. I can hold the brew in the Clever Coffee Dripper for however long I like to get it to the strength I desire, but the filter (paper, sold separately) eliminates the sediment. All the strength of a French-pressed cup of coffee, none of the yuck! Brilliant! Thanks guys!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Morrison

customer_reviews.title: makes great coffee
customer_reviews.text: Works great, just as described. This is the larger one, it makes a full cup of coffee. You can steep the coffee as long as you want, make it just to your taste.and sits on top of your cup to drain directly into the cup. Wish it came with a built in filter like the smaller version. without it there are lots of grounds in the cup. I found it works better with a cone disposable filter. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: On a trip to Seattle stopped by Starbucks Reserve Tasting Room. I needed something non-electric for the office and have used a French Press till it fell a part. Was messy to clean. They suggested using the Clever which uses a #4 filter. Was running out of room in my luggage so waited to buy till I got home. Makes a greet cup of coffee and much easier to clean since you can just toss out the filter. At home I grind right before brewing. For the office I grind enough for the week and store in a small airscape.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Best way to make coffee
customer_reviews.text: Best coffee maker ever. You can make it as strong or as weak as you want, and because the water can sit in here (without leaking at all) for a few minutes, you get a full flavored cup of coffee, just as nature intended. It's large enough to make a huge cup of coffee (over 12 oz) or two smaller cups. As soon as you lift it up off of the cup, it stops and doesn't drip. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: ... 2 stars is that when it worked it was wonderful, loved it
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I give this 2 stars is that when it worked it was wonderful, loved it. But today while washing, it fell apart. I used it just under a month, not even everyday. Bummer. Love the idea but the execution? Crap. Called Amazon for a refund. Got it.
customer_reviews.author: r zwickler

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, I've used this type in the past. This item is made in Taiwan not China .I would recommend this to anybody as a pour-over type. This item holds the water in with the coffee grounds . It steeps it for as long as you need. Then set the whole device on top of a cup. It's strains it right into the cup.
customer_reviews.author: opieatc40

customer_reviews.title: Move Over Aeropress
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Aeropress for years and felt there was nothing that could beat it for producing single cup servings. I finally found something. The Clever is simply superb. I was very skeptical about the claims that it could produce a distinctly better, less bitter cup of coffee. But it truly does. And it's just as simple and easy to clean. The Aeropress will always remain a great product in my mind. But I've put in on a shelf above my countertop to make room for the Clever.
customer_reviews.author: Steve in Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Very well made unit. The valve on the bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made unit. The valve on the bottom is a real plus since it allows you to let the coffee brew a while before decanting it into your cup or pot. The one we purchased is for our camper so we will probably get one for the home. UPDATE....we did purchase a second one for home after using the first one during a two week camping trip. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!
customer_reviews.author: Catspaw

customer_reviews.title: No more wasting coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I received my first Clever Coffee Dripper in October as a birthday present and am now buying one for travel. It's a brilliant, simple concept. The coffee sits in the dripper until you place it over a cup. The coffee produced is as good as the coffee made in my very expensive coffeemaker. You need to add hot water (about 205of) and let the coffee steep for about four minutes. The device is not made to keep coffee hot for a long time. Its purpose is to make just a few cups of wonderful, full-flavored coffee. No more wasting coffee left over in the big coffeemaker. I will buy a few more as gifts for friends who appreciate great coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Perenelle

customer_reviews.title: It's easy and it allows me the freedom to experiment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Clever Coffee Dripper for my father after discovering that he was using a very large coffee maker to make his one cup of joe in the mornings. I have had my Clever now for three years. It's easy and it allows me the freedom to experiment. This Clever makes two cups of coffee but a single cup can be made as well and, by playing with the coffee to water ratio it makes very good cappuccino :-) My father loves his new coffee dripper. He's even become a bit snobbish about his coffee no longer referring to his morning cup as 'just a cup of joe'.
customer_reviews.author: kalennon

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this. I like to steep my coffee grounds in the hot water for a few minutes before filtering. It saves on coffee grounds and makes the coffee strong how I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Webb

customer_reviews.title: Why it is better? The magic is  steeping the coffee in the holder.
customer_reviews.text: The Clever Coffee Dripper is amazing. Makes a great cup of coffee. Here's why...the coffee steeps in the holder until it is ready, then you fill your cup. It isn't making the steeping time work by the speed of your filter as it trickles into your cup or decanter. This also lets you use way less coffee to make even a strong cup of coffee. I have had several of these and our household loves coffee from this over our french press or Nespresso machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent single cup coffee maker for strong coffee lovers!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Now I can make a single cup of coffee, steep it for as long as I want to make a deeper, richer flavor before I strain it into the mug. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price is well worth having fresh coffee every morning. ...
customer_reviews.text: Price is well worth having fresh coffee every morning. My last one worked 3-4 times a day for four years before the bottom dropped out from too many miles. This is worth your time to use and also worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sleutel-Robinson

customer_reviews.title: BEST WAY TO MAKE COFFEE!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good dripper. Works well - best way to make coffee - you can choose how long you "brew" it before draining.
customer_reviews.author: McNair

customer_reviews.title: Got the large after previously purchasing the smaller one, ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the large after previously purchasing the smaller one, whose lid cracked quickly (maybe even first use) and doesn't fill a cup of coffee. This is the size you want for a full cup of coffee in a regular mug. Although basically same design as smaller one, this one is more sturdily built.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after a year.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, but it's barely a year old and it's already leaking. Only used once a day and not even every day. Pretty pathetic considering they charge premium prices for them. I'm buying elsewhere from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Yamashita

customer_reviews.title: but I already love it. It makes a great cup and is ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this dripper for about a week, but I already love it. It makes a great cup and is much less finicky than other devices. Just make sure that you rinse your filters. My only concern is the the durability of the stopper in the bottom, but I'm probably over thinking that.
customer_reviews.author: Jessparado

customer_reviews.title: So easy and delicious coffee! ☕️ 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: I already own several of these. They are the best and easy to use drip coffee maker. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Blair E Parr

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love, love this coffee dripper. This is my second one because I broke the first one and was devastated. Coffee comes out perfect every time. I love that I really control how strong the coffee is by how long I let it steep before letting it drip out.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Works well - I wasn't entirely sure how much coffee/water to use, so I used about 3 tbsp coarse ground coffee with 10 oz water and steeped for about 3 minutes with boiling water. Makes good coffee, very easy to clean. Great for people who only need to make one mug of coffee at a time and don't feel like messing with a French press. To be honest I can't differentiate between coffee quality past like 'mediocre' so I couldn't tell you how good it is relative to other coffeemakers, but I liked it and used a lot less extra stuff in my coffee than I usually do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent cup of coffee each time
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves being able to make a single, excellent cup of coffee each time. But one of the little feet came off relatively quickly and now it's a hassle to use. This is a pity; the product was working really well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite way to make my coffee
customer_reviews.text: My favorite way to make my coffee. I have used the keurig, the aeropress, french press and regular drip. The flavor and ease of use far exceeds these methods when I use the clever. I do use a fine grind using a burr grinder. I like a Vienna roast. I let it brew for the full 4 minutes. Perfect cup every time.
customer_reviews.author: kimeepoo60

customer_reviews.title: Interesting Idea but poorly executed
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't even make a whole cup of coffee and it leaks - stay away!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Makes great coffee - but plastic breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, makes excellent coffee - but it breaks easily. I have owned two in the last two years and on each one, one of the little tab feet have broken, each time with a resultant coffee spilling disaster. Finally I bought a similar ceramic brewer from Bonavita with a manually operated lever valve that doesn't have the same potential for random breakage.
customer_reviews.author: catgirl 12

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be the best of both worlds--a filter and plug to allow some ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used the brewer for a week now. It seems to be the best of both worlds--a filter and plug to allow some ease and control as well as a better brew from my beans. The device allows me to brew into my thermal carafe for work. I make 15 oz to allow room for a touch of half and half.
customer_reviews.author: Hews

customer_reviews.title: Game chanher
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer for my coffee in the morning. So much easier to clean than a french press with all of the strong flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Incredible coffee
customer_reviews.text: Makes an incredible cup of coffee! It seems like a French press and pour over combined.
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is no joke - its the best inexpensive home brewing gadget you'll find that doesn't leave grounds in your coffee ( like a press) or require the attention of a pour over, but still makes a perfect single serving every time. Its really just an easy-to-use immersion system that is designed to use the well-described ideal ratio of ground coffee to water. By the way, this is my second Clever Dripper - the first lasted about 4 years but cracked when it fell off the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great way to start the day...
customer_reviews.text: This awesome device is a cross between a French press and a cone drip. You get a cup of steeped coffee without the "grit" in pressed coffee. It's easy to use and easy to clean. Great way to start the day.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Berendsen

customer_reviews.title: Clever Coffee Dripper
customer_reviews.text: I bought the coffee dripper for my husband because he has been using one for years and doesn't think anything else makes as good a coffee as your Clever Coffee Dripper. His old one just got so old it leaked too much... he is delighted to have a new one to use every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with my Clever Coffee dripper
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with my Clever Coffee dripper. Its well made, it doesnʻt stain. Its easy to clean and the coffee is truly better. This particular one was a few dollars more than others, but I read the reviews and decided to spend a few extra. Iʻm glad I did. I noticed that when compared to other drippers, this one doesnʻt stain as easily. I will likely purchase a couple more for Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: aolaniK

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea and the coffee is delicious but the bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: Cool idea and the coffee is delicious but the bottom leg chipped after a couple of months making it unstable to brew over a mug. We've decided to avoid plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Cverhoff

customer_reviews.title: The best way to great coffee
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased my second one as we love this simple, effective and foolproof way to great coffee. My first one was a gift from my foodie/gourmand son, and if it meets with his approval, well heck it's got to be great and it is. At this price point it is the best coffee maker on the market
customer_reviews.author: RT Cool

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: Best coffee maker for folks like me: lazy, but love robust coffee and don't have the luxury of counter space. After about a year of daily use, the gasket tends to die, puncturing the coffee filter and allowing grinds to flow out. But for the price, taste, and easy of use, it's totally worth buying one every year. I'm on to my fourth one.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: This amazing little thoughtful contraption is the best of both worlds ...
customer_reviews.text: This amazing little thoughtful contraption is the best of both worlds in one - a french press and single drip. The end product after the immersion process is a rich, smooth, non-bitter, clean cup of coffee. I tend to like my coffee more like an espresso, and this process allows for all the flavor and none of the bitterness and icky grinds. I am won over after trying all different kinds of gadgets. I am sticking with this method, which is overall a very thoughtful design. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You Made Me a Coffee Drinker!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my coffee drinking husband as an emergency item in case the electricity ever went out and he needed his morning cup. Turns out this thing makes such good coffee, I, (a tea drinker) have been using it every morning since I got it! Maybe it's the novelty or the fact that I can control the strength, but I am really enjoying this item. I intend to buy another as a gift for another coffee lover in the family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new go to machine
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! Pretty easy to clean, especially in comparison to my coffee press! Great for cold brew and for hot! Just an all around awesome go to machine!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is just so easy to make coffee in. The clean up is so much faster then the French Press and tastes just as good to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Even when I pre heat everything the coffee doesn't seem to be as hot as I like it. I'll stick with my Melitta cone and ...
customer_reviews.text: This works as it should. I've found that I prefer the pour over method though. Even when I pre heat everything the coffee doesn't seem to be as hot as I like it. I'll stick with my Melitta cone and long spout kettle.
customer_reviews.author: cookiesrgood

customer_reviews.title: I really loved this coffee dipper its really cool and work good ...
customer_reviews.text: Clever Coffee Dipper By Coastline, I really loved this coffee dipper its really cool and work good im happy to have this one.thank you for this seller i received this product with a good discount!!
customer_reviews.author: mike lawson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was lightning fast- I got the "shipped" notification a few hours after ordering. The Clever Coffee Dripper is an awesome product - we are picky about our coffee and this is an excellent option to take advantage of good beans. Bought this one as a replacement for one that cracked after 6 years of at least twice daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea here
customer_reviews.text: I have an aeropress and a few pour over cones. I like the idea here, but the cleanup is just too much of a hassle compared to other systems.
customer_reviews.author: wat3456

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: This is great for letting your coffee steep and extracting it's full flavor, similar to a French press, but easier and less messy to clean. Also works great for travel. We have a $350 Breville coffee maker but I prefer to use the Clever Coffee Dripper for superior flavor. The only downside is having to buy filters.
customer_reviews.author: happycamper

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee
customer_reviews.text: Easy brewing, good tasting coffee. Very satisfied with all aspects of this product. Needs permanent filter included.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Burris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for single-mug brewing
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd replacement in a dozen years. Perfect for that single travel mug of drip coffee in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: I love them. Best way there is to make a ...
customer_reviews.text: This my 3rd CCD. I love them. Best way there is to make a smaller amount of good tasty coffee. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Micky

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee every time.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Only way to brew perfect coffee every time. My last one lasted 5 years before numerous hairline cracks developed in it and it eventually started to leak.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I liked the idea of a ceramic product
customer_reviews.text: I tried the Bonavita immersion dripper first. I liked the idea of a ceramic product. But when it's on a cup, it's top heavy and I broke two in a month. Decided the ligher plastic version of the Clever Dripper was practical. I also like the release mechanism of the clever dripper. It also has a slightly larger capacity than the Bonivita dripper. Bottomline clever dripper costs less and is more practical than the Bonavita.
customer_reviews.author: Quaternary Geologist

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've used one of these for years and was delighted to purchase a replacement for it! It is the easiest, quickest way to make a great cup of coffee....then just pop the filter in the trash. Another benefit of it over a French press is that the coffee is filtered which is important to people watching their cholesterol as oils in coffee can elevate cholesterol levels. So thankful to find this!!
customer_reviews.author: Susie G

customer_reviews.title: Loved this thing until it slipped off the counter and ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved this thing until it slipped off the counter and one of the plastic feet snapped off. Had to toss it because it would tip when on the counter
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love this coffee brewer
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee brewer. We use it at the coffee shop that I work at. Recommend you buy a scale to use with it. Very easy to use if you just want a fresh single cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Neal

customer_reviews.title: but she thinks it makes the best tasting coffee that you can make at home
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the Clever dripper that she's had for a few years. it's developed some hairline cracks and become a bit leaky, over time and from being dropped at least once, but she thinks it makes the best tasting coffee that you can make at home. I bought her this new one for her birthday, as a replacement for the leaky one. She doesn't usually like to receive kitchen things as gifts, but she's very happy with this present.
customer_reviews.author: Neil S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Loving our Clever coffee dripper! Perfect for an afternoon break or an after dinner cup. It is well made and the large size is perfect for 2. So glad we found it.
customer_reviews.author: AmaGam

customer_reviews.title: Drinking coffee from it right now as I write this ...
customer_reviews.text: Drinking coffee from it right now as I write this review! Girlfriend has one and turned me onto this filter holder. Coffee is a fuller flavored!
customer_reviews.author: Perry A. Brokaw

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this clever coffee dripper for my brother who ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this clever coffee dripper for my brother who suffered a stroke and only has one arm and hand to use. This coffee dripper suits his needs as he is starting to become independent. It allows him to make his morning coffee with out a giant mess. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recomended!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased my second Clever Coffee Dripper. I have given it as a gift and, after 5 years, it was time to replace my old one, as I had dropped it one too many times. Makes great coffee and is vastly superior to regular drip systems. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Pressedratnd73

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great for single cups of coffee instead of brewing a full pot.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Fleck

customer_reviews.title: Clever brewer is fantastic. It is an incredibly versatile brewer in which ...
customer_reviews.text: Clever brewer is fantastic. It is an incredibly versatile brewer in which there are a number of brew guides readily available online. Coastline and Batch coffee are wonderful distributers of this product!
customer_reviews.author: AWL

customer_reviews.title: Clever II
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one, and I thoroughly enjoy coffee from it. Service from Amazon was excellent, also!
customer_reviews.author: Merilyn C. Kaufmann

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: If it wasn't plastic, I would have tried harder. If the coffee was fantastic, I would have tried even harder. I ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Maven

customer_reviews.title: Easy and consistent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, easy to use and consistent. This device really is 'clever' and you have to work at getting a bad cup from it. Recommended to anyone that likes good coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: So Easy
customer_reviews.text: Received my new Clever Coffee Dripper about a week ago. It's so easy to use. I made an awesome cup of coffee the very first use. I have used it everyday since. Will be easy to take on trips as well. The only downside is you can only make 1 mug at a time. I have used a French Press for years and like the convenience of making a full pot of coffee. But for.now I'm enjoying the Clever Brew because it's easy and makes a great cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Irvin

customer_reviews.title: French Press, no more.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Just a little bit of a "leak" at the bottom but nothing too awful. Glad it comes with the coaster to catch it.
customer_reviews.author: Lez

customer_reviews.title: It works great, easy cleaning and makes a good cup of ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great, easy cleaning and makes a good cup of 12 oz coffee. I am only giving 4 stars because it does not make 18 oz. but would definitely recommend it if size does not matter.
customer_reviews.author: pika

customer_reviews.title: For those who love their coffee
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He absolutely loves how his coffee is and when his last one broke (after years) it had to get replaced immediately.
customer_reviews.author: jparteach

customer_reviews.title: As good as any barista!
customer_reviews.text: Simple, easy to use, super easy to clean, and my coffee tastes fantastic. Love mine!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: I love how easier this works for me
customer_reviews.text: I love how easier this works for me.It is indeed clever. I thoroughly enjoy pour over coffee at home now. I watched a video to get all the secrets as such washing the filter, observing the bloom etc. And this will be easy to travel with, too.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Very Clever!
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and ingenious design. As easy as a manual drip cone, but allows longer brew time of French press - and since you use a paper cone filter, you can use any grind.
customer_reviews.author: David Dill

customer_reviews.title: Makes the perfect cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: Makes the perfect cup of coffee, if only one cup is what you desire. easy to clean but I do recommend putting it in the dishwasher once a week to really get it clean and make sure it can air dry completely every day.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product soooo much! So easy to use and light and easy to store!
customer_reviews.author: julie d. drake

customer_reviews.title: Pourover at Work
customer_reviews.text: This is great for a pour over like cup of coffee. :-)
customer_reviews.author: GDB

customer_reviews.title: Worksmwell
customer_reviews.text: Works well as advertised. Not sure it works better than a french press but is much easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: dkrae

customer_reviews.title: BPA
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee dripper! It makes really good coffee with no plastic taste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy awesome coffee
customer_reviews.text: Really fits my needs, makes a single great tasting cup at a time with out any special skills!
customer_reviews.author: Trogaroo

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I love the coffee that this method produces! All the full flavor of immersion brewing without the oils and grit. Once I dialed in my brewing method I have loved every cup.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Baker

customer_reviews.title: very happy, will recommend to friends
customer_reviews.text: Works just as the ad says, very happy, will recommend to friends.

customer_reviews.title: I have never tried a brewing method that brings out the flavor better. LOVE my clever dripper
customer_reviews.text: I seriously will never make coffee another way. I have never tried a brewing method that brings out the flavor better. LOVE my clever dripper!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the Clever Coffee Dripper because it allows control of ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the Clever Coffee Dripper because it allows control of the extraction. It can be a pour over or the extraction can happen over a period of time. Uses #4 filters and it is much easier to clean up with the clever dripper vs stainless steel pour overs.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this! ☕️
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! My husband is already eyeing it up. Gives the coffee a more rich taste to it.
customer_reviews.author: SATRN

customer_reviews.title: A great dripper that works very well
customer_reviews.text: A great dripper that works very well. Easy to use, easy to clean and works like magic. Weigh your coffee, pour in hot water, let sit, and then place on your cup and the coffee drains. Brings out flavor nuances in my coffee that I am not even aware of. A great purchase for a great cuppa!
customer_reviews.author: GOTOM

customer_reviews.title: I'll have another
customer_reviews.text: Not only did o buy a clever Dripper but I had to get another. These are perfect gifts for any coffee enthusiast. The integrity of the company and ease Of the order and shipping process will have me coming back again.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Lyons

customer_reviews.title: I probably have every version of press but never like cleaning the press
customer_reviews.text: I probably have every version of press but never like cleaning the press. This dripper is a super fast and easy clean up, and the coffee is as good or better than the press. I am a happy coffee drinker. Bought one for a friend too.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: Makes great coffee. Easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Clever Cup. They work great. This order arrived on time and had an improved lid that doesn't create a vacuum like the 1st version. I have and will recommend these to other 1 large cup-o-day drinkers like myself. If you like French press style coffee but hate the clean up of the French press, give this product a try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For anyone who likes GEEAT coffee made easy!
customer_reviews.text: Makes fabulous coffee, simple to use, and only takes a few minutes. I only wish there were an even larger size because I am used to drinking a bit more coffee than it yields. But in this case I will gladly take quality over quantity! Wish I had discovered it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Regina a. Silbert

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee!
customer_reviews.text: Really like the coffee made with the Clever Dripper compared to the French Press I was using. Now to dial in dose, grind, temp and time for my taste. I really like the cleaner taste a filter gives.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Gortemiller

customer_reviews.title: Full immersion brewer.
customer_reviews.text: Great little device. Let's you control immersion time to figure out what works best for each coffee type and grind size. Brewing concentrate over ice will be great this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Rice

customer_reviews.title: This is definitely a clever way to make a good cuppa coffee
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a clever way to make a good cuppa coffee! We like to make 3 cups in our household and it works nicely to get the most out of our beans, while having a simple morning drip ritual. Easy to clean up too.
customer_reviews.author: Laura A.

customer_reviews.title: I love this pour over for making my one cup of ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this pour over for making my one cup of coffee in the am! It's a fast drip and the contraption on the bottom makes the dripping stop when you lift it from the cup. An old roommate had one, and when I moved out I had to have one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Calderara
